library(visdat)

## Datos

```{r}
datos_a <- read.csv("../datos/PublicPSTunaFlag.csv", header = T)
str(datos_a)

datos_b <-  read.csv("../datos/PublicPSTunaSetType.csv", header = T)
str(datos_b)
```

```{r}
captura_anual_especies <- datos_a %>%
  group_by(Year) %>%              
  summarise(across(c(ALB, BET, BKJ, BZX, FRZ, PBF, SKJ, TUN, YFT), sum, na.rm = TRUE))  

captura_anual_long <- captura_anual_especies %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = c(ALB, BET, BKJ, BZX, FRZ, PBF, SKJ, TUN, YFT), 
               names_to = "Especie", 
               values_to = "Captura")

ggplot(captura_anual_long, aes(x = Year, y = Captura, color = Especie)) +
  geom_line(linewidth = 1.2) + 
  theme_minimal() +  
  labs(title = "Capturas Anuales por Especie", 
       x = "AÃ±o", 
       y = "Captura Total", 
       color = "Especie") +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))

```
